Index.title: Hey I'm
Index.experienceHero: 12 years of experience, including 5 years in Moscow.
Index.title2: I'm an Off-site bartender for the events
Index.stackdesc: Check out the tools i use daily
Index.description: With over a decade of experience in high-end cocktail bars and event bartending across Moscow and beyond, I provide premium mobile bar services tailored to any occasion. From birthdays and weddings to corporate events and private parties, I offer a seamless, turnkey bar experience‚Äîincluding alcohol selection, custom cocktail creation, glassware rental, and ice delivery. Having worked in renowned venues such as Soho Rooms, Club Home 16, Waves Restaurant & Lounge Bar, and The Grill & Chill Restaurant, I bring a deep understanding of mixology and hospitality. My fully equipped mobile bar ensures an engaging and visually captivating experience for your guests. Available for urgent bookings, holidays, and large-scale events (300+ guests), I am committed to elevating your event with expertly crafted cocktails and top-tier service.

Projects.description: Here are some of the projects I have worked on. Click on a project to view more details.
